mapper.select: SELECT "DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho"."jigyoshaMeisho" FROM rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho" WHERE "DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho"."isDeleted" = FALSE AND "DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho"."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード} AND "DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho"."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = #{調査委託先コード}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT4201NinteichosaIraiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" ON "DbT4201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" = "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" AND "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."isDeleted" = FALSE INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND "DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster"."isDeleted" = FALSE WHERE "DbT4201NinteichosaIraiJoho"."isDeleted" = FALSE AND "DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード} AND "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{調査委託先コード} AND "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."ninteiChosainCode" = #{調査員コード}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster" ON "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = "DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND "DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster"."isDeleted" = FALSE WHERE "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."isDeleted" = FALSE AND "DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster"."shichosonCode" = #{市町村コード} AND "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = #{調査委託先コード} AND "DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho"."ninteiChosainCode" = #{調査員コード}
